Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory285.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You have traveled for a while without running into any surprises while having also gathered quite a bit of data.'}
{2: "Let's sort out all the key information first.", 3: '8'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Alright, I've laid out all the known information on the Ascendants and Huaxu. I can use this database to screen for useful intel.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It looks like a daunting task. Let's do it!", 4: '3'}
{3: 'You reconvene after investigating for quite some time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I haven't found anything that matches the keywords.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...All I see is the Corrupted going about their boring routine.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'What about Liv?', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I didn't find any useful clues matching the keywords, but I came across a letter... A farewell letter, rather.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'A farewell letter?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Well, a torn farewell letter. It\'s only the first half of the page. I was able to find it because it contains the word "Huaxu".', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Correct. It says: "I found a way to fight the Punishing Virus. I wanted to use it to create the legendary Huaxu Utopia. But it has cost all of my possessions, and it appears that I will die before its completion..."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '"If you are reading this letter, please look for it at the location below..."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The last part is missing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'A method to fight the Punishing Virus?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's probably either a ruse or just nonsense.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're right. We can't confirm it without the last part. But it shouldn't go ignored.", 4: '3'}
{2: "Let's look for the last part of the letter.", 3: '30'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Alright. We'll keep an eye out. Let's keep going, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The Corrupted up ahead are all on the left. The path on the right seems to be safer.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Left or right?'}
